metric.name: serializationTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent serializing objects.

metric.name: serializations
metric.description: Total number of object serialization calls.

metric.name: deserializationTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent deserializing objects.

metric.name: deserializations
metric.description: Total number of object deserialization calls.

metric.name: asyncQueues
metric.description: Current number of queues for asynchronous messaging.

metric.name: asyncQueueSizeExceeded
metric.description: Total number of asynchronous queues that have exceeded the maximum size.

metric.name: asyncQueuedMsgs
metric.description: The total number of queued messages used for asynchronous queues.

metric.name: overflowQueueSize
metric.description: The number of normal distribution messages currently wait­ing to be processed.

metric.name: partitionedRegionQueueSize
metric.description: The number of high priority distribution messages currently waiting to be processed.

metric.name: partitionedRegionQueueThrottleCount
metric.description: The total number of times a thread was delayed in adding a normal message to the high priority queue.

metric.name: partitionedRegionQueueThrottleTime
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent delayed by the high priority queue throttle.

metric.name: partitionedRegionThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been created for the pool handling partitioned region messages.

metric.name: partitionedRegionThreadJobs
metric.description: The number of messages currently being processed by partitioned region threads

metric.name: partitionedRegionThreads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing partitioned region messages.

metric.name: sentCommitMessages
metric.description: The number of transaction commit messages that the Gem­Fire system has created to be sent. Note, it is possible for a commit to only create one message even though it will end up being sent to multiple recipients.

metric.name: commitWaits
metric.description: The number of transaction commits that had to wait for a response before they could complete.

metric.name: sentMessagesTime
metric.description: The total amount of time this distribution manager has spent sending messages, which includes broadcastMessagesTime.

metric.name: sentMessagesMaxTime
metric.description: The highest amount of time this distribution manager has spent distributing a single message to the network.

metric.name: broadcastMessages
metric.description: The number of distribution messages that the GemFire sys­tem has broadcast. A broadcast message is one sent to every other manager in the group.

metric.name: broadcastMessagesTime
metric.description: The total amount of time this distribution manager has spent broadcasting messages. A broadcast message is one sent to every other manager in the group.

metric.name: receivedMessages
metric.description: The number of distribution messages that the GemFire sys­tem has received.

metric.name: receivedBytes
metric.description: The number of distribution message bytes that the GemFire system has received.

metric.name: sentBytes
metric.description: The number of distribution message bytes that the GemFire system has sent.

metric.name: processedMessages
metric.description: The number of distribution messages that the GemFire sys­tem has processed.

metric.name: processedMessagesTime
metric.description: The amount of time this distribution manager has spent in message.process().

metric.name: messageProcessingScheduleTime
metric.description: The amount of time this distribution manager has spent dis­patching a message to processor threads.

metric.name: waitingQueueSize
metric.description: The number of distribution messages currently waiting for some other resource before they can be processed.

metric.name: overflowQueueThrottleTime
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent delayed by the overflow queue throttle.

metric.name: overflowQueueThrottleCount
metric.description: The total number of times a thread was delayed in adding a normal message to the overflow queue.

metric.name: highPriorityQueueSize
metric.description: The number of high priority distribution messages currently waiting to be processed.

metric.name: highPriorityQueueThrottleTime
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent delayed by the high priority queue throttle.

metric.name: highPriorityQueueThrottleCount
metric.description: The total number of times a thread was delayed in adding a normal message to the high priority queue.

metric.name: serialQueueSize
metric.description: The number of serial distribution messages currently waiting to be processed.

metric.name: serialQueueBytes
metric.description: The approximate number of bytes consumed by serial distri­bution messages currently waiting to be processed.

metric.name: serialPooledThread
metric.description: The number of threads created in the SerialQueuedExecutor­Pool.

metric.name: serialQueueThrottleTime
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent delayed by the serial queue throttle.

metric.name: serialQueueThrottleCount
metric.description: The total number of times a thread was delayed in adding a ordered message to the serial queue.

metric.name: serialThreads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing serial/ordered messages.

metric.name: processingThreads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing normal messages.

metric.name: highPriorityThreads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing high priority messages.

metric.name: partitionedRegionThreads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing partitioned region messages.

metric.name: waitingThreads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing messages that had to wait for a resource.

metric.name: messageChannelTime
metric.description: The total amount of time received messages spent in the dis­tribution channel.

metric.name: replyMessageTime
metric.description: The amount of time spent processing reply messages: final String distributeMessageTimeDesc = The amount of time it takes to prepare a message and send it on the network. This includes sentMessagesTime.

metric.name: nodes
metric.description: The current number of nodes in this distributed system.

metric.name: replyWaitsInProgress
metric.description: Current number of threads waiting for a reply.

metric.name: replyWaitsCompleted
metric.description: Total number of times waits for a reply have completed.

metric.name: replyWaitTime
metric.description: Total time spent waiting for a reply to a message.

metric.name: replyWaitMaxTime
metric.description: Maximum time spent transmitting and then waiting for a reply to a message. See sentMessagesMaxTime for related information.

metric.name: replyTimeouts
metric.description: Total number of message replies that have timed out.

metric.name: receiverConnections
metric.description: Current number of sockets dedicated to receiving messages.

metric.name: failedAccepts
metric.description: Total number of times an accept (receiver creation) of a connect from some other member has failed.

metric.name: failedConnects
metric.description: Total number of times a connect (sender creation) to some other member has failed.

metric.name: reconnectAttempts
metric.description: Total number of times an established connection was lost and a reconnect was attempted.

metric.name: lostConnectionLease
metric.description: Total number of times an unshared sender socket has remained idle long enough that its lease expired.

metric.name: sharedOrderedSenderConnections
metric.description: Current number of shared sockets dedicated to sending ordered messages.

metric.name: sharedUnorderedSenderConnections
metric.description: Current number of shared sockets dedicated to sending unordered messages.

metric.name: threadOrderedSenderConnections
metric.description: Current number of thread sockets dedicated to sending ordered messages.

metric.name: threadUnorderedSenderConnections
metric.description: Current number of thread sockets dedicated to sending unordered messages.

metric.name: asyncQueueFlushesInProgress
metric.description: Current number of asynchronous queues being flushed.

metric.name: asyncQueueFlushesCompleted
metric.description: Total number of asynchronous queue flushes completed.

metric.name: asyncQueueFlushTime
metric.description: Total time spent flushing asynchronous queues.

metric.name: asyncQueueTimeoutExceeded
metric.description: Total number of asynchronous queues that have timed out by being blocked for more than async-queue-timeout millisec­onds.

metric.name: asyncDistributionTimeoutExceeded
metric.description: Total number of times the async-distribution-timeout has been exceeded during a socket write.

metric.name: asyncQueueSize
metric.description: Current size in bytes used for asynchronous queues.

metric.name: asyncDequeuedMsgs
metric.description: The total number of queued messages that have been removed from the queue and successfully sent.

metric.name: asyncConflatedMsgs
metric.description: The total number of queued conflated messages used for asynchronous queues.

metric.name: asyncThreads
metric.description: Total number of asynchronous message queue threads.

metric.name: asyncThreadInProgress
metric.description: Current iterations of work performed by asynchronous mes­sage queue threads.

metric.name: asyncThreadCompleted
metric.description: Total number of iterations of work performed by asynchro­nous message queue threads.

metric.name: asyncThreadTime
metric.description: Total time spent by asynchronous message queue threads per­forming iterations.

metric.name: receiverDirectBufferSize
metric.description: Current number of bytes allocated from direct memory as buffers for incoming messages.

metric.name: receiverHeapBufferSize
metric.description: Current number of bytes allocated from Java heap memory as buffers for incoming messages.

metric.name: senderDirectBufferSize
metric.description: Current number of bytes allocated from direct memory as buffers for outgoing messages.

metric.name: senderHeapBufferSize
metric.description: Current number of bytes allocated from Java heap memory as buffers for outgoing messages.

metric.name: replyHandoffTime
metric.description: Total number of seconds to switch thread contexts from pro­cessing thread to application thread.

metric.name: partitionedRegionThreadJobs
metric.description: The number of messages currently being processed by parti­tioned region threads.

metric.name: viewThreads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing view messages.

metric.name: serialThreadJobs
metric.description: The number of messages currently being processed by serial threads.

metric.name: viewThreadJobs
metric.description: The number of messages currently being processed by view threads.

metric.name: serialPooledThreadJobs
metric.description: The number of messages currently being processed by pooled serial processor threads.

metric.name: processingThreadJobs
metric.description: The number of messages currently being processed by pooled message processor threads.

metric.name: highPriorityThreadJobs
metric.description: The number of messages currently being processed by high priority processor threads.

metric.name: waitingThreadJobs
metric.description: The number of messages currently being processed by wait­ing pooly processor threads.

metric.name: syncSocketWritesInProgress
metric.description: Current number of synchronous/blocking socket write calls in progress.

metric.name: syncSocketWriteTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent in synchro­nous/blocking socket write calls.

metric.name: syncSocketWrites
metric.description: Total number of completed synchronous/blocking socket write calls.

metric.name: syncSocketWriteBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes sent out in synchronous/blocking mode on sockets.

metric.name: ucastReads
metric.description: Total number of unicast datagrams received.

metric.name: ucastReadBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes received in unicast datagrams.

metric.name: ucastWriteTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent in unicast data­gram socket write calls.

metric.name: ucastWrites
metric.description: Total number of unicast datagram socket write calls.

metric.name: ucastWriteBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes sent out on unicast datagram sockets.

metric.name: ucastRetransmits
metric.description: Total number of unicast datagram socket retransmissions.

metric.name: mcastReads
metric.description: Total number of multicast datagrams received.

metric.name: mcastReadBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes received in multicast datagrams.

metric.name: mcastWriteTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent in multicast dat­agram socket write calls.

metric.name: mcastWrites
metric.description: Total number of multicast datagram socket write calls.

metric.name: mcastWriteBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes sent out on multicast datagram sockets.

metric.name: mcastRetransmits
metric.description: Total number of multicast datagram socket retransmissions.

metric.name: mcastRetransmitRequests
metric.description: Total number of multicast datagram socket retransmission requests sent to other processes.

metric.name: serializedBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes produced by object serialization.

metric.name: deserializedBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes consumed by object deserialization.

metric.name: msgSerializationTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent serializing mes­sages.

metric.name: msgDeserializationTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent deserializing messages.

metric.name: batchSendTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent queueing and flushing message batches.

metric.name: batchWaitTime
metric.description: Reserved for future use

metric.name: batchCopyTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent copying mes­sages for batched transmission.

metric.name: batchFlushTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent flushing batched messages to the network.

metric.name: ucastFlushes
metric.description: Total number of flushes of the unicast datagram protocol, prior to sending a multicast message.

metric.name: ucastFlushTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent waiting for acknowledgements for outstanding unicast datagram mes­sages.

metric.name: flowControlRequests
metric.description: Total number of flow control credit requests sent to other pro­cesses.

metric.name: flowControlResponses
metric.description: Total number of flow control credit responses sent to a requestor.

metric.name: flowControlWaitsInProgress
metric.description: Number of threads blocked waiting for flow-control recharges from other processes.

metric.name: flowControlWaitTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent waiting for other processes to recharge the flow of the control meter.

metric.name: flowControlThrottleWaitsInProgress
metric.description: Number of threads blocked waiting due to flow-control throt­tle requests from other members.

metric.name: jgNAKACKreceivedMessages
metric.description: Number of received messages awaiting stability in NAKACK.

metric.name: jgNAKACKsentMessages
metric.description: Number of sent messages awaiting stability in NAKACK.

metric.name: jgUNICASTreceivedMessages
metric.description: Number of received messages awaiting receipt of prior mes­sages.

metric.name: jgUNICASTsentMessages
metric.description: Number of un-acked normal priority messages.

metric.name: jgUNICASTsentHighPriorityMessages
metric.description: Number of un-acked high priority messages

metric.name: jgUNICASTdataReceivedTime
metric.description: Amount of time spent in JGroups UNICAST send.

metric.name: jgSTABLEsuspendTime
metric.description: Amount of time JGroups STABLE is suspended.

metric.name: jgSTABLEmessages
metric.description: Number of STABLE messages received by JGroups.

metric.name: jgSTABLEmessagesSent
metric.description: Number of STABLE messages sent by JGroups.

metric.name: jgSTABILITYmessages
metric.description: Number of STABILITY messages received by JGroups.

metric.name: jgUDPupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanosecnds, spent in JGroups UDP processing up events.

metric.name: jgUDPdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups UDP processing down events.

metric.name: jgNAKACKupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups NAKACK process­ing up events.

metric.name: jgNAKACKdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups NAKACK process­ing down events.

metric.name: jgUNICASTupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups UNICAST process­ing up events.

metric.name: jgUNICASTdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups UNICAST process­ing down events.

metric.name: jgSTABLEupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups STABLE processing up events.

metric.name: jgSTABLEdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups STABLE processing down events.

metric.name: jgFRAG2upTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups FRAG2 processing up events.

metric.name: jgFRAG2downTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups FRAG2 processing down events.

metric.name: jgGMSupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups GMS processing up events.

metric.name: jgGMSdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups GMS processing down events.

metric.name: jgFCupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups FC processing up events.

metric.name: jgFCdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups FC processing down events.

metric.name: jgDirAckupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups DirAck processing up events.

metric.name: jgDirAckdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups DirAck processing down events.

metric.name: jgVIEWSYNCdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups VIEWSYNC pro­cessing down events.

metric.name: jgVIEWSYNCupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups VIEWSYNC pro­cessing up events.

metric.name: jgFDdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups FD processing down events.

metric.name: jgFDupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups FD processing up events.

metric.name: jgTCPGOSSIPdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups TCPGOSSIP pro­cessing down events.

metric.name: jgTCPGOSSIPupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups TCPGOSSIP pro­cessing up events.

metric.name: jgDISCOVERYdownTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups DISCOVERY pro­cessing down events.

metric.name: jgDISCOVERYupTime
metric.description: Time, in nanoseconds, spent in JGroups DISCOVERY pro­cessing up events.

metric.name: jgDownTime
metric.description: Down Time spent in JGroups stacks.

metric.name: jgUpTime
metric.description: Up Time spent in JGroups stacks.

metric.name: jChannelUpTime
metric.description: Up Time spent in JChannel including jgroup stack.

metric.name: jgFCsendBlocks
metric.description: Number of times JGroups FC halted send events due to back­pressure.

metric.name: jgFCautoRequests
metric.description: Number of times JGroups FC automatically sent replenish­ment requests.

metric.name: jgFCreplenish
metric.description: Number of times JGroups FC received replenishments mes­sages from receivers.

metric.name: jgFCresumes
metric.description: Number of times JGroups FC resumed sends events due to backpressure.

metric.name: jgFCsentCredits
metric.description: Number of times JGroups FC sent credits events to a sender.

metric.name: jgFCsentThrottleRequests
metric.description: Number of times JGroups FC sent throttle events requests to a sender.

metric.name: asyncSocketWritesInProgress
metric.description: Current number of non-blocking socket write calls in progress.

metric.name: asyncSocketWrites
metric.description: Total number of non-blocking socket write calls completed.

metric.name: asyncSocketWriteRetries
metric.description: Total number of retries needed to write a single block of data using non-blocking socket write calls.

metric.name: asyncSocketWriteTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent in non-blocking socket write calls.

metric.name: asyncSocketWriteBytes
metric.description: Total number of bytes sent out on non-blocking sockets.

metric.name: asyncQueueAddTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent in adding mes­sages to async queue.

metric.name: asyncQueueRemoveTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent in removing messages from async queue.

metric.name: jgDirAcksReceived
metric.description: Number of DirAck acks received.

metric.name: jgFragmentationsPerformed
metric.description: Number of message fragmentation operations performed.

metric.name: jgFragmentsCreated
metric.description: Number of message fragments created.

metric.name: socketLocks
metric.description: Total number of times a socket has been locked.

metric.name: socketLockTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent locking a socket.

metric.name: bufferAcquiresInProgress
metric.description: Current number of threads waiting to acquire a buffer.

metric.name: bufferAcquires
metric.description: Total number of times a buffer has been acquired.

metric.name: bufferAcquireTime
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent acquiring a socket.

metric.name: messagesBeingReceived
metric.description: Current number of messages being received off the network or being processed after reception.

metric.name: messageBytesBeingReceived
metric.description: Current number of bytes consumed by messages being received or processed.

metric.name: serialThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been created for the serial message executor.

metric.name: viewThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been created for the view message executor.

metric.name: processingThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been created for the pool processing normal messages.

metric.name: highPriorityThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been created for the pool handling high priority messages.

metric.name: waitingThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been created for the wait­ing pool.

metric.name: partitionedRegionThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been created for the pool handling partitioned region messages.

metric.name: serialPooledThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been created for the serial pool(s).

metric.name: TOSentMsgs
metric.description: Total number of messages sent on thread owned senders.

metric.name: functionExecutionQueueSize
metric.description: The number of high priority distribution messages currently waiting to be processed.

metric.name: functionExecutionQueueThrottleCount
metric.description: The total number of times a thread was delayed in adding a normal message to the high priority queue.

metric.name: functionExecutionQueueThrottleTime
metric.description: The total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent delayed by the high priority queue throttle.

metric.name: functionExecutionThreadStarts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been created for the pool handling function execution messages.

metric.name: functionExecutionThreadJobs
metric.description: The number of messages currently being processed by function execution threads

metric.name: functionExecutionThreads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing function execution messages.
